page.title: 19Mobile Clinic and Library
page.content:
Once a month a{mobile library}van provided by the County Council of Shropshire comes to Tibberton. The people who have got tickets for the Library can have as many books as they like.There is a fabulous range of books. There are also{large {print books}to help people who cannot see very well.
The County Council also provides a {mobile clinic}which comes around every third Monday of the month. It stays for about one hour so that all the mothers can take their children that are under five years of age. There is also a{health visitor}and a{nurse.}They see the children and give advice to their mothers.They weigh the babies and give them tests and also injections if necessary.
